name: PageLayout
description: Represents a collection of all the styles.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's orientation of the page.

properties.name: paperSize
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's paper size of the page.

properties.name: blackAndWhite
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's black and white print option.

properties.name: printErrors
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's print errors option.

properties.name: zoom
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's print zoom options.

properties.name: centerHorizontally
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's center horizontally flag. This flag determines whether the worksheet will be centered horizontally when it's printed.

properties.name: centerVertically
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's center vertically flag. This flag determines whether the worksheet will be centered vertically when it's printed.

properties.name: printHeadings
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's print headings flag. This flag determines whether headings will be printed or not.

properties.name: printGridlines
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's print gridlines flag. This flag determines whether gridlines will be printed or not.

properties.name: leftMargin
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's left margin, in points, for use when printing.

properties.name: rightMargin
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's right margin, in points, for use when printing.

properties.name: topMargin
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's top margin, in points, for use when printing.

properties.name: bottomMargin
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's bottom page margin to use for printing in points.

properties.name: headerMargin
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's header margin, in points, for use when printing.

properties.name: footerMargin
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's footer margin, in points, for use when printing.

properties.name: printComments
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the worksheet's comments should be displayed when printing.

properties.name: draftMode
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's draft mode option. If true the sheet will be printed without graphics.

properties.name: firstPageNumber
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's first page number to print. Null value represents "auto" page numbering.

properties.name: printOrder
properties.description: Gets or sets the worksheet's page print order option. This specifies the order to use for processing the page number printed.

properties.name: headersFooters
properties.description: Header and footer configuration for the worksheet.

methods.name: setPrintMargins
methods.description: Sets the worksheet's page margins with units.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Measurement unit for the margins provided.

parameters.name: marginOptions
parameters.description: Margin values to set, margins not provided will remain unchanged.

methods.name: setPrintArea
methods.signature: setPrintArea(printArea: Range or RangeAreas or string)

parameters.name: printArea
parameters.description: The range, or RangeAreas of the content to print.

methods.name: getPrintArea
methods.description: Gets the RangeAreas object, comprising one or more rectangular ranges, that represents the print area for the worksheet. If there is no print area, an ItemNotFound error will be thrown.

methods.name: getPrintAreaOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the RangeAreas object, comprising one or more rectangular ranges, that represents the print area for the worksheet. If there is no print area, a null object will be returned.

methods.name: setPrintTitleRows
methods.description: Sets the rows that contain the cells to be repeated at the top of each page of the worksheet for printing.

parameters.name: printTitleRows
parameters.description: The rows to be repeated at the top of each page, range must span the entire row to be valid.

methods.name: setPrintTitleColumns
methods.description: Sets the columns that contain the cells to be repeated at the left of each page of the worksheet for printing.

parameters.name: printTitleColumns
parameters.description: The columns to be repeated to the left of each page, range must span the entire column to be valid.

methods.name: getPrintTitleRows
methods.description: Gets the range object representing the title rows.

methods.name: getPrintTitleRowsOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the range object representing the title rows. If not set, this will return a null object.

methods.name: getPrintTitleColumns
methods.description: Gets the range object representing the title columns.

methods.name: getPrintTitleColumnsOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the range object representing the title columns. If not set, this will return a null object.
